title: Faith Fuels Good Choices
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Meg Meeker
itunes:summary:
Reading how Jesus treated people in Scripture is a beautiful opportunity to see His character. To help encourage your child's faith, Danny tells John about one of his favorite Scriptures he's taught his kids. Featuring Dr. Meg Meeker.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Raising a Strong Daughter in a Toxic Culture" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-04-28?refcd=1440302

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/faith-fuels-good-choices/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/navigating-a-toxic-culture-with-your-daughter-digital-product/?refcd=1427301

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
